name: Maryose Coleman
title: Vice President & Director, Client Services
bio: Maryrose began her working life on Bay Street, at the original Toronto Stock Exchange. An avid art collector with a keen eye for interior design, Maryrose left the world of finance to become the Director of Prime Gallery, working with museums and private clients as an art appraiser and consultant. After partnering with Shima Homes of Toronto, Maryrose founded Prime Custom Homes of Toronto, designing and building luxury residences in some of Toronto’s most exclusive neighbourhoods. Maryrose’s extensive client experience makes her an invaluable team member at MDR. Her management of MDR's Guest Concierge Services is extremely well received and enriches the rental experience of our guests.

name: Ross Halloran
title: Ross Halloran Founder
bio: Ross Halloran brings a wealth of business experience to the luxury rentals industry. An executive-level business development and marketing professional, Ross has over 30 years experience helping Fortune 500 Canadian, U.S. and International clients execute successful sales, advertising, marketing & loyalty programs. Ross applies a proven, needs-based, analytical approach to customer service. For vacation property owners in Muskoka and other popular lake districts in Central Ontario, Ross maximizes property values by safely generating rental income for his clients while applying best practices to help mitigate other costs of ownership.
